Name: Bilingual deaf children RU-Kentalis database
Description: The corpus is used for investigating the bilingual language and communication development of young deaf children in Sign Language of the Netherlands (SLN) and Dutch.
Size: 4 GB complete video recordings. 1 GB selected parts video recordings. 0,1 GB selected parts transcripts. 0,5 GB test and background data of 11 deaf children, longitudinal, 104 recordings
